Cursed Art Thou Mary! Thy Holy birth has bought thee a curse? Cursed Art Thou Saints! Thy blood sacrifice has bought thee shame? If thy reward, has enslaved thee night and day, interceding in behalf of the" sins" committed by the human race rather than enjoying the blissful peace of God.

Sigh.
 
 For a change, I have no idea what you are talking about.
 
 edit: So therefore I think a change of tactics is called for. From now on I will interpret your posts however I wish, and will reply to them in a similar vein. Hopefully through this brave new step into mutual approach some understanding may be found.
